attributes.action: Change the system such that only net tax payers get a vote on how tax is used.
attributes.additional_details: Perhaps create a dual voting system for general law and a separate one for tax related law.
attributes.background: Ensure that the voting systems for tax law is defined only by net tax payers.

rejection.details: Unclear what is being asked for here - two different sorts of national election?  referenda on tax issues open only to net tax-payers?  The request is too imprecise for there to be a meaningful response to it or debate on it.
